content.raw:
I tested this PR using the launch confirmation below:

`ign launch tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG3`

Performance indeed improved. See RTF value before \(**20.78%**\) and after \(**61.53%**\). Full video [here](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1cCBH_eazolBET9hSbvz5uz7iDnjc8qtI).

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1859850638-before_pr216.png)
  

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3411078233-after_pr216.png)
